title: Renaissance Dance Forms
objectives: Understand social context of court dances

materials.summary: Explore the sophisticated dance forms that emerged during the Renaissance period, particularly in European courts.

sections.heading: Court Dances
sections.content:
The Renaissance period saw the rise of elaborate court dances that reflected the sophistication and etiquette of royal courts.

These dances were not merely entertainmentâ€”they were displays of grace, social status, and cultural refinement.

sections.heading: Influence on Ballet
sections.content: Many elements of Renaissance court dance laid the foundation for classical ballet, including posture, footwork patterns, and the emphasis on elegance and control.
